name: VBError
summary: VBError is a base class for your own errors.
description: VBError is a base class for your own errors. It makes error creation and handling more effective. When handling error you can check class instead of making domain+code check. You can also create same errors(domain+code) in different parts of code by creating an instance of the same VBError subclass. Use case 1. 1. Create VBError subclass. 2. Call +errorWithCode:, errorWithUserInfo:, +errorWithCode:userInfo: or +errorWithError: to create an instance. Use case 2 1. Create VBError subclass. 2. Implement +code method. 3. Call +error, +errorWithUserInfo: to create an instance.
